attributes.review: IT TOOK almost a WEEK just to fully be downloaded. That wasn't the only bad thing, once I opened the app I saw a Cheeto puff on my screen 🤢. I thought I signed up for Joe Biden’s app! 🙄 It also TOOK ALL MY DATA, and jacked my phone, so I had to buy A WHOLE NEW PHONE! 👿👿👿👿! GRRR 0/5 DON’T DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: SUPER BAD 😡🙀 BAD EXPERIENCE 👿

attributes.review: i thought that downloading an app by a so called “business man” would prove to be a good app. but, this app is filled with homophobia, racism, sexism, pedophila, etc. MAYBE it’s because the guy it surrounds is a piece of human garbage!! oh well. this app is trash. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!!!!
attributes.title: one of the worst apps in history

attributes.review: infested with a bunch of rats and roaches jumping out of the screen, hissing at me. Very disappointed, but they had a few manners. I didn’t expect this from our wonderful president. Would not recommend at all 💖✨
This app took a full day to download! The Quality is horrible and it lags a lot. On top of that it takes up all my space on my phone. Just in all is horrible app! 0/10. DONT RECOMMEND!!!!!
attributes.title: Horrible 😤

attributes.review: It took weeks to download and when it did it took and hacked everything on my phone anyone who downloads this app rate it a one star and delete the app immediately👁👄👁
attributes.title: App

attributes.review: I hate how long it takes to load. It’s extremely slow and then it awfully shows lies about what a racist person is doing trying to act like a president.
attributes.title: Awful app

attributes.review: I was asked immediately to enter my phone number and couldn’t use the app unless I consented to text messages and phone calls, meaning they will spam my phone. I thought this was a FREE COUNTRY!
attributes.title: AWFUL!

attributes.review: the app took 2 centuries to download. once it downloaded it started to hack my phone. everything got hacked even my text messages. it got my location too😡. i am ENRAGED and would like to speak to the manager🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE🤬

attributes.review: From the leader of the worlds most “free” country I expected more racism, bigotry, and homophobia but was sadly mistaken. Truly disappointed!! 😣👅🛌 where has this world gone when I can’t enjoy a good slaughter of some human rights??????
attributes.title: I really expected more

attributes.review: I get very negative vibes off this app!! A lot on there is just trash. Why would they make a app for a orange like frr annoying orange shiii going on. But anyhoo fix it and make someone else own that app that knows how to be a president! Thank you sister🤡✨
attributes.title: Trump 2020✨💕in Hell🥰😘
